name: Stellar-0922
description:
Are you ready for an intergalatic adventure? If so, then you are right here! In this Pixel-Platformer you can explore three unique planets, gather analytic material and rescue long lost robots.

Setting:

For centuries spaceships have travelled the galaxies and explored the planets and their flora and fauna. Stellar-0922 is a recently built robot that is now being prepared for their first explorations on extraterrestrial planets. While exploring they will encounter different lifeforms, discover some beautiful secrets and find some long lost friends.

Features:

- 3  unique levels

- 4 petable creatures

- cute little robots

Credits:

Sounds & Music by Epidemic Sounds
